name: Tracker App
description: A tracking app that trackers amount driven, fuel usage, and driving limit. Built with React, Redux, and Rails.

name: NewsWeek clone
description: A NewsWeek clone built to replicate the popular news outlet, 'NewsWeek'. Built with Html, CSS, and Bootstrap 4.

name: Bookstore CMS
description: A book store CMS that handles and tracks books read. Built with React, Redux, and Styled Components.

name: Facebook Clone
description: A FaceBook clone with login, friends and friend requests, timeline, and more. Built with Ruby and Rails.

name: Calculator
description: A calculator with all adding, subtracting, divding, and multiplying functionality. Built with React.

name: Ecommerce App
description: My first project, an ecommerce application with login, checkout, payment, and more. Built with React and Nodejs.
